bio: I am a second-year Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science at UC Santa Barbara, fortunate to be advised by Professor Xin Eric Wang.
Previously, I was a member of THUNLP supervised by Professor Zhiyuan Liu. In the summer of 2022, I conducted research under Professor Xin Eric Wang at UCSC.
My research focuses on LLM, Agent, Reasoning, RL, Efficiency.
